U rbana , Illinois
March 29, 195^
Mr* John DeProspo
Executive Officer
Municipal Broadcasting System
Municipal Building
New York, ?, N, Y.
Dear John:
Three checks for Miss Citowits enclosed. First
has Social Security deductions for this check and the previous,
from which I took none, Bast two have usual 2$*
Sincerely,
Frank E. Schooley
Manage Treasurer
